=== Details ===

'''Homepage''': http://askubuntu.com <<BR>>
'''Member of:''' the <nowiki>[[http://stackexchange.com|Stack Exchange]]</nowiki> network of sites

Ask Ubuntu is a community driven question and answer site dedicated to Ubuntu.

Created on July 28th, 2010, the site has grown quickly, with over 33,000 users (yes, that's thirty-tree-thousand).
